answers.answer: Oh no! It's great that everything is ok w the baby.  Happy belated bday. Get well soon!

I had preeclampsia with my daughter. They induced me the day my tax check came back lol I was so mad because I was trying to get things for my daughter with the money. Anyhow, she was five days overdue and very stubborn. Even after they gave me the meds to induce me I was in labor about 26hours but she popped right out lol good luck!
Thanks girlies im jus bummed out a lil ready to meet my lil girl n be out of this pain!

question: Yesterday was my birthday and my doc called and said to go to labor and delivery due to high bp and kidneys! Baby girl is doin great so im happy im jus n bad shape! Also havin a crohns flare up
title: preeclampsia and kidneys now admitted
